query:
UPDATE app.collections
            SET
                title = COALESCE($1, title),
                slug = COALESCE($2, slug),
                description = CASE WHEN $3 THEN $4 ELSE description END,
                status = COALESCE($5, status),
                last_updated_by = $6
            WHERE id = $7
            RETURNING id AS "id: ProjectCollectionId"
